story:
***********************************************************************
Für deutschsprachige Unterstützer gibt es weiter unten auch eine deutsche Projektbeschreibung.
***********************************************************************
_____________________________________________________________________________
Thanks again to all supporters for funding this book. To everyone who is late to the party: There is still a very limited number of books left. It you are interested, please contact me. Please note that I check my Indiegogo mail regularly but not daily, so it might take some time for me to answer.
____________________________________________________________________________

IMPORTANT UPDATE / Great News:

The printer has just lowered the prizes on his previous offer, so we will be able to provide every  supporter, who chose a perk containing a physical copy of the book, with a 17x24 cm (6.69x9.45 in) hardcover version if the project reaches its 5000 € funding goal.

WICHTIGES UPDATE / Gute Nachricht:

Der Druckdienstleister hat zum neuen Jahr die Preise gesenkt, daher können wir jetzt jedem Unterstützer, der einen Perk gewählt hat, das ein gedrucktes Buch enthält, ein 17x24 cm Hardcover anbieten, falls das Projekt das 5000 € Funding-Ziel erreicht.
_____________________________________________________________________________
Alice's Adventures in Wonderland is without doubt one of the most wonderful and enthralling stories of all time. It manages to fascinate children and adults alike with its quirky characters and witty wordplay. In fact the story is still so fresh and vibrant that it seems hard to believe that it wasn't just written yesterday.
The story of Alice and her adventures in that strange and yet familiar land down the rabbit hole has inspired dozens of artists and quite a handful of movies. Because the world, that Lewis Carroll described so vividly, touched me deeply and made me want to add and share my own vision - a colorful and somewhat crazy one - of what the Wonderland might look like.
My goal was to find an art style that is fitting both to children and adults, just like the story itself is. I wanted the illustrations to mirror the mad fun of the words and to still stay true to the text itself.

What I came up with you can see for yourself in this fully illustrated book with over 50 watercolor paintings presented in what I hope you will find a unique and highly unusual style.
The book will be available in the English original by Lewis Carroll or a completely new German translation.
I try to fund this book on Indigogo, because I want to provide you with the best  possible production quality for this book and its unique and wonderful story about growing up and what it is like to be a child in a world full of wonder.
The illustrations for the book proper are already finished. The money I try to raise will go into the printing of the book and to make the stretch goals possible. Larger print runs make individual books cheaper to produce so by working together we can make the book larger, make it even into a hardcover for everybody and add many neat and fancy options, like bonus illustrations on extra pages, embossing etc.
Shipping, as always in international campaigns, will be a major cost factor, too. Last but not least Indigogo and Paypal fees need to be paid.


********************
German description
********************

Alice im Wunderland ist ohne Zweifel eine der schönsten und zauberhaftesten Geschichten aller Zeiten. Sie fasziniert Kinder und Erwachsene gleichermaßen mit ihren verrückten Charakteren und cleveren Wortspielen. Tatsächlich wirkt die Geschichte immer noch so frisch, als sei sie erst gestern geschrieben worden.

Seit meiner Kindheit hat mich die Geschichte von Alice und ihrer Reise in der durchgedrehten Welt des Wunderlands fasziniert und auch heute noch entdecke ich immer wieder Neues, wenn ich die Geschichte lese. Mit einer neuen Übersetzung, einem liebevollen  Layout und über 50 abgedrehten Aquarell-Illustrationen möchte ich euch in die Welt am Ende des Kaninchenlochs entführen - in eine Welt kindlicher Anarchie und zauberhafter Figuren.

Wofür das Geld verwendet wird:

Die Illustrationen und das Basislayout des Buchs sowie die Übersetzung sind bereits fertig. Das Geld aus dieser Kampagne ist für den Druck der Bücher gedacht. Da mit steigender Auflage die Fertigungskosten des einzelnen Buchs sinken, möchte ich durch die Stretch-Goals gemeinsam mit Euch die bestmögliche  Produktionsqualität für das Buch erreichen: ein größeres Format, Bonusillustrationen und Material aus dem Sketchbook auf zusätzlichen Seiten, ein Hardcover und weitere Extras für alle und ohne Mehrkosten.


****************************************************************************
Die Übersetzung (About the German Translation)
****************************************************************************

Um das Buch auch auf Deutsch herausgeben zu können war es wichtig, eine neue deutsche Übersetzung des Textes anzufertigen. Denn während der Originaltext nach dem Urheberrecht mittlerweile rechtefrei ist, unterliegen die modernen Übersetzungen immer noch dem Copyright.

Die Übersetzung selbst war nicht ganz einfach. Der Text ist voller Anspielungen und Doppeldeutigkeiten die es einzufangen gilt. Der Übersetzungsprozess lief in mehreren Phasen ab: Zunächst habe ich den Text Wort für Wort und Satz für Satz von der ungekürzten Originalversion so wörtlich wie möglich ins deutsche Übertragen. Dabei habe ich die problematisch zu übersetzenden Teile für eine spätere Optimierungen markiert.

Im nächsten Schritt habe ich zur Referenz Martin Gardners "Annotated Alice" zu herangezogen, ein Buch, dass ich jedem des Englischen mächtigen Alice-Fan nur wärmstens ans Herz legen kann. Es erläutert detailliert die ansonsten manchmal etwas schwer herzuleitenden Anspielungen auf die viktorianische Zeit und die Originalgedichte, welche Lewis Carroll in seiner Geschichte parodiert. Außerdem habe ich mehrere Übersetzungen aus meiner Sammlung bereitgelegt und die verschiedenen Lösungsansätze verglichen.
Das Ziel war, eine Übersetzung zu schaffen, welche dem Originaltext so nahe wie möglich kommt und den kompletten, ungekürzten Text wiedergibt.

Die Gedichte waren eine besondere Herausforderung. Hier galt es eine Balance zwischen der äußeren Form der Gedichte und einer möglichst genauen Übersetzung zu finden. In einem der kommenden Updates zu dieser Kampagne werde ich eines der Gedichte und die Übersetzung, so wie sie sich im Buch findet, posten, damit ihr einen Eindruck davon bekommen könnt, wie dies gelungen ist.
Zum Schluss hat eine gute Freundin von mir, die als Lektorin und Redakteurin arbeitet, den deutschen Text nochmals überarbeitet, damit alles gut klingt und möglichst fehlerfrei und schön zu lesen ist. Auch hierbei wurde immer mit Blick auf den Originaltext gearbeitet.

Das Ergebnis ist ein Text, der mit viel Liebe zum Detail die Schönheit von Lewis Carrolls Sprache einzufangen versucht und dem Original so nahe wie möglich kommt, ohne auf eine gute Lesbarkeit und Verständlichkeit zu verzichten.
***************************************************************************

Risks and Challenges

As stated above the illustrations for the book itself are already done as is most of the layout work and the translation for the German version of the book. As a professional graphic designer I manage print files and order printing products on a daily basis.
That being said, sometimes things go awry at the printer, which can cause a slight delay when the complaint is reviewed and a new print run has to be made. Since I have already worked with the print shop I intend to commission the manufacturing of the book to and know it will be high quality work, made in Germany, the chances are low though.
If the 25,000 € stretch goal is met, I will employ the help of a media production expert, to make sure that the book will have a tasteful finishing and meets the highest production quality standards.
The time needed for me to make the additional illustrations for the extra pages as well as the final layout for the book to look nicely at the size it will be produced is already factored into the production and delivery schedule. Me becoming sick or having an accident or some other misfortune happening may of course delay that work, but please believe me when I say that I hope that this does not happen more than you do.
If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.


FAQ

I don't live within the European Union, Canada or the USA. Can I support the campaign by choosing physical perks, too?

Of course. Just ask me about the shipping costs to your destination. You'll then need to add only the amount to your pledge that the shipping costs to your location exeed the shipping costs already included in your chosen perk. Depending on where you live that might be zero. Actually for most destinations it is.

Do the Original Watercolor Perks include a copy of the book?

Sorry, but no. If one bought more than one watercolor he or she would have to pay for multiple copies of the book and that didn't seem to be fair.
But if you want to buy multiple watercolors I will gladly give you a discount or upgrade if you want to buy a book, too, depending on the shipping costs saved.

Ich interessiere mich für das Buch mit dem PDF. Kann ich das Buch in Deutsch und das PDF in Englisch bekommen (oder umgekehrt)?

Kein Problem. Zum Ende der Kampagne gibt es eine kleine Umfrage und jeder kann die von ihm oder ihr gewünschte Sprachversion oder die Kombination aus beiden angeben.

Sind die "Signed and Numbered Edition" (signiert und numeriert) und die "Sketch Edition" (mit einer Zeichnung) auch auf Deutsch verfügbar?

Ja. Die Sprachversion des Buches ist auf jedem Perk-Level frei wählbar. Zum Abschluss der Kampagne wird jeder Unterstützer gebeten werden, die gewünschte Sprachversion für sein Buch anzugeben.

story:
Short Summary

In February of 2012, an enterprising young comics fan named Hannah found herself wishing for a community where she could talk to other awesome women about shared nerdy loves.  Thus, Ladies' Night at Graham Cracker Comics was born!

A year later, and we are putting together an anthology that features original comics, art, and prose from more than twenty contributors.  Consider it a love letter to the city that brought us all together, and a coup for the independent creatives community that's growing all over the world.

What We Need & What You Get

To make all this awesomeness happen, we need a some cash on hand to print the book and some amazing original artwork in the form of prints and buttons.  Your contribution to our $1000 goal will help us with:

  • First run print 
  • Hundreds of buttons and prints to send to our campaign contributors and sell along with the book.
  • Marketing online and in person at events like C2E2 (Chicago Comics and Entertainment Expo) and Free Comic Book Day.
  • A second volume of the anthology.

That's right...any money left over will contribute to starting up a second volume of the anthology--all of our contributors are volunteering their time and talent.

So check out our awesome perks! Contribute at any level and you get the PDF of the full anthology, but there's a bunch of amazing swag and art that is available.  We're even taking advertisers to help defer the cost of printing.

International supporters PLEASE NOTE: if you need to ship internationally, please add $10 to your contribution.

(If you contribute and your perk includes a button or print, you will be given an option of which of our varient three pieces of original artwork you would like to receive.)

The Impact

We all know that women and other minorities are grossly under-represented in mainstream comics.  The success of Womanthology last year proved that this doesn't need to be the case!  Whether you exclusively read superhero titles from the Big Two or you're an avid webcomic fan, every fan wants a place to feel like they belong, surrounded by other enthusiasts.  Our goal is to create an (ongoing) anthology that features the amazing talents of women who love comics in every form they come in, and the much-needed diversity that they have to offer to the industry.

Let's show the big guys how it's done.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute monetarily at this time, please help us spread the word!  We have a Facebook page and a website to tell you more about GCC Ladies' Night and our awesome community of readers.  

Regardless, we hope to see you at our next Ladies' Night!

Our Contributors

Anissa Espinosa
Caitlin Peters
Caitlin Rosberg
Cynthia Bottomley
Elizabeth Fogarty
Hannah Chapman
Jennifer Aprahamian
Kat Leyh
KayPee Luczak
Kim Garvey

Kris Mackenzie
Lauren Burke
Lisa Kwon
Megan Byrd
Raven A. Moore
Shay Barron
Summer Sparacin
Tara Zuber
Wendi Freeman

story:
Our Story

Paper Dream Productions was started by Jay and Drew Sternitzky as a creative outlet to their work. Jay is a writer and Drew a painter, and they combined their creative urges into Paper Dream Productions' first project, SHORT-STACK: TALES OF A SUPER-HUMAN PLUMBER. 

Jay has written as a hobby for years and this is his first foray into published/commercial work. Drew has been spotlighted in numerous art galleries across the country for his paintings.

So how did they end up here?

Jay had the kernel of the story hatched from a common egg he had shared with Drew, and after a brief attempt at telling a comic with someone other then Drew, threw up his arms in frustration and asked the one man who should have been doing the book all along - Drew.

And now, after years of effort (let's give it up to Drew for pencilling, inking and painting every page!), the first chapter in the story of Harry Trufont is ready for print!


The Impact

Your donation to help us get the first print run completed allows us expand our convention budget and advertise the book via print and web venues. And, unlike other crowd-sourcing sites, IndieGoGo gives us our donations whether we meet our goal or not - no matter what happens with the fundraising drive we still get the money that was already donated! Thank you.


What We Need & What You Get

What do we want?

A little bit of help to get the book out in front others! The money donated goes directly to printing the first collected edition (Issues #1-4) of SHORT-STACK: TALES OF A SUPER-HUMAN PLUMBER for sale via the web and at conventions.

So, what do you get out of it? 

Well, for starters, anyone who contributes will have their name published as a 'Thank-You' in the book - we really do appreciate all of the support we've gotten! 

Vanity not enough? Well, then we have a deal for you...

DREW'S ORIGINAL HAND WATERCOLORED PAGES AVAILABLE FOR THE FIRST TIME!

That's right, Drew's original watercolored pages are now available for the 1st time - for only a $100 dollar donation! AND you don't just get the original art from Issue #1 or #2 of the book - you get a signed copy of the collection from Drew and Jay, the original issues signed, and a signed/numbered print of the collected edition cover.

And there's even more...

With eight donation levels, up to $200 there's something great for everyone who donates!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the idea, but can't help right now...?

     Forward this to anyone who might be interested!

If you've already donated and want to do more...!

     Forward this to anyone who might be interested! Let them know about SHORT-STACK and Paper Dream Productions...and most importantly...

THANK YOU FOR TAKING THE TIME TO SEE WHAT WE'RE ALL ABOUT!

story:
VOLETE PRIMA LEGGERE IL VOLUME 1 O IL VOLUME 2? NIENTE PAURA! COMPRATELI QUI, NEL PERIODO DEL CROWDFUNDING LI POTETE ACQUISTARE AL PREZZO SPECIALE DI 15 EURO!
 

Note for English people:unfortunately this campaign is reserved only to Italian people (due to limited budget). In case of overfunding we will evaluate to release an English version and for information write to info@tatailab.com

Menu

Introduzione

I Perks

La storia

I personaggi

Il progetto

Come useremo questi fondi?

Come possiamo aiutare?

 

Introduzione

Ciao a tutti, mi chiamo Chiara e sono qui per presentare il secondo volume di Anima.

1 anno fa a quest'ora abbiamo lanciato la prima campagna di crowdfunding del mio progetto e a Lucca Comics siamo usciti con il primo volume! Siete stati fantastici! La prima tiratura è andata totalmente esaurita e ho ricevuto da tantissimi di voi molte parole di affetto e supporto <3
Ora siamo di nuovo qui, su Indiegogo, per lanciare la campagna per il TERZO e ULTIMO volume; la storia continua ed è sempre più esplosiva. Siete curiosi di continuare a leggere le avventure di Marco, Anima e tutti gli amici del Borgo? Questa è l'occasione per aiutarci a rendere concreto questo ultimo volume!

Ecco a voi...

Il terzo e ultimo volume di ANIMA.

ANIMA è un fumetto di genere fantastico, ricco di personalità, emozione, colori e follia. 
Stilisticamente riconducibile ai moderni codici orientali, con un segno fresco che strizza l’occhio agli anime e un’impostazione narrativa tanto europea quanto giapponese, Anima è un libro vivace, fresco, pulsante.

 

I Perks

 

LIBRO A CASA

Il libro a fumetti di Anima (92 pagine a colori formato 21 x 29,7 cm - Cartonato) - IL LIBRO E' GIA' PRONTO e ti verrà spedito direttamente a casa.

 

LIBRO A LUCCA

Il libro a fumetti di Anima (92 pagine a colori formato 21 x 29,7 cm - Cartonato) - IL LIBRO E' GIA' PRONTO e lo ritirerai a Lucca Comics allo stand Tatai Lab.

 

VOLUME 1 + VOLUME 2 + VOLUME 3

Vuoi acquistare tutta la storia completa in un unico pacchetto? Ecco il perk che fa per te! Tutti e 3 i volumi, ad un prezzo esclusivo, da ritirare a Lucca Comics oppure ricevere comodamente a casa tua!

 

LIBRO + ARTBOOK

Il preziosissimo ed esclusivo Artbook di Anima, con tutti i disegni preparatori di Chiara Zuliani. 
Disponibile solamente con questa ultima campagna di crowdfunding, non sarà mai più messo in vendita (64 pagine a colori - F.to 20 x 20 cm).

 

LIBRO + USB

Il Libro + una chiavetta USB 3d raffigurante il personaggio di ANIMA realizzata da Maikii + stampa autografata della cover.

 

LIBRO + CUSTOM A4

Libro + Commission personalizzata, in B&N in A4 + stampa autografata della cover.

 

LIBRO + CUSTOM A3

Libro + Commission personalizzata, in B&N in A3 + stampa autografata della cover.

 

ROYALE

Libro + Usb + Artbook + Custom A3 + Stampa autografata della cover.

 

La storia

Se nel secondo volume Marco e gli altri hanno dovuto affrontare il torneo Gilgamesh, in questo terzo albo le cose si fanno ancora più serie! Il Borgo, infatti, si trova in una situazione finanziaria instabile, a causa degli avvenimenti avvenuti in precedenza, e Maman si trova costretta, suo malgrado, a chiedere aiuto alla Creazione, l'organizzazione dei mondi aperti. In tutto questo Marco ha iniziato il suo allenamento sotto la supervisione di Anima, alla quale cerca in più modi di avvicinarsi, senza successo. 

Quale segreto nasconde la ragazza? E Marco riuscirà a diventare abbastanza forte da riaffrontare la sua ombra e realizzare finalmente il suo potenziale?

 

I personaggi

 

MARCO

“...Meh.” -cit.

Dopo aver abbandonato l’università, Marco lavora come commesso al Suppa Market e conduce una vita noiosa e ripetitiva. É goffo ed impacciato e molto spesso finisce in situazioni imbarazzanti, dalle quali esce sempre con l’amaro in bocca. Da qualche anno la sua personalità ha preso una brutta piega, trasformandolo in una persona apatica e cinica. Qualcosa nell’ombra lo sta lentamente divorando, ma cosa?

 

ANIMA

“Voi umani siete tutti uguali, di continuo a lamentarvi senza fare nulla aspettando un qualcosa che vi salvi e vi sollevi dalle vostre sofferenze. Quando verrà il giorno in cui vi prenderete le vostre maledette responsabilità?” -cit.

Cacciatrice di Demoni caotica e imprevedibile. Anima porta distruzione, disinteressandosi delle conseguenze sugli esseri umani che, anzi, disprezza. A differenza dei suoi colleghi, non mira a distruggere i Demoni, bensì ad ammansirli e farli passare dalla sua parte, garantendole potere e protezione. È impulsiva ed infantile e sebbene le sue doti siano molte, è assolutamente negata a relazionarsi con il prossimo.

 

HORMON

“Non c’è abbastanza zucchero!” -cit.

Dal carattere altezzoso e dispotico, Hormon è una Musa, Demone che vive a stretto contatto con gli esseri umani e che ha sviluppato una personalità ed un ego propri. Trae forza dall’energia che scaturisce dalle persone in preda a forti emozioni e dai quintali di zucchero che ingerisce ogni giorno (preferibilmente sotto forma di marshmellow); è in grado di intervenire sugli stati emotivi altrui dando un improvviso senso di benessere seguito da un boost di energia. Si diverte a giocare con le emozioni delle persone, in particolare stimolandone la libido, dalle quali trae poi nutrimento. Sebbene il suo aspetto sia carino e coccoloso e inciti allo spupazzamento, vi conviene non allungare troppo le mani: morde.

 

RAMA

“Dov’è il divertimento se non c’è sfida?” cit.

Considerato un genio, Rama è un cacciatore di Demoni dalla bravura eccezionale, ma dal carattere impossibile. Accetta solo incarichi se interessanti e/o se pagato profumatamente, non si fa problemi ad abbandonare una missione se la ritiene sotto ai suoi standard di “sfida” e non ha alcun rispetto per le persone che non siano per lui fonte di divertimento.  Seppure i suoi fan (e le sue amanti) siano numerosi, conduce una vita solitaria accompagnato da Hāthī, un pupazzo automa che lui stesso ha creato e che gli funge da segretaria personale. Questa, oltre ad organizzare l’agenda e gestire i contatti, tiene conto di tutte le uscite videoludiche nel periodo lavorativo di Rama, le quali quest’ultimo recupererà richiudendosi in casa per mesi, giocando fino al completismo più estremo.

MAMAN

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!!” -cit

Maman è una guaritrice molto famosa e con una lista d’attesa quasi interminabile. Con le sue terapie ha salvato non poche vite, tra cui quelle di personaggi famosi e potenti. Sempre positiva, il suo motto è “la guarigione inizia sempre con una sana risata” e la sua, in particolare, scalda gli animi più tristi. La si può considerare il sindaco del Borgo, luogo incantato e in continua trasformazione, dove vivono molti Demoni e personaggi particolari, tra cui la stessa Anima. Come quest’ultima, anche Maman ha la capacità di legare con i Demoni e uno tra questi è talmente potente da essere la base su cui poggia l’intero Borgo.

 

MOMO & PAPILLON

“Doppio High five dell’amicizia!!!” -cit.

Migliori amiche da sempre, Momo e Papillon appartengono alle due famiglie rivali del Borgo: quella dei Gatti del porto e quella dei Procioni del quartiere commerciale. Momo  ha un carattere dolce e gentile, lavora come cameriera e ragazza delle consegne per il Ramen-ten della madre e quando ha tempo va ad aiutare lo zio al Sushi-ya. Papillon  ha un carattere forte e altruista, lavora al supermercato di famiglia, ma è più il tempo che perde in giro a divertirsi che quello che impegna effettivamente a lavorare. Nonostante le continue lamentele da parte dei parenti, ad entrambe piace trasformarsi in esseri umani perchè lo trovano divertente e comodo. Tutte e due sono le candidate numero uno per succedere al posto di capofamiglia: riusciranno a rappacificare le acque tra i clan?

 

SIRIO

“Cacciatori di Demoni, Streghe, Stregoni, Pirati Spaziali, ne ho abbastanza! Sempre a complicare cose che potrebbero essere semplici! Vivere una vita normale vi è così difficile?” -cit.

Apparentemente scontroso, ma dal cuore d’oro, Sirio lavora presso il Sushi-ya di Sakana-san come apprendista. Non sta mai con le mani in mano e passa il suo tempo libero ad aiutare gli abitanti del Borgo in difficoltà: è praticamente un tuttofare. Non mostra minimamente interesse per le mirabolanti avventure di Anima, anzi, il solo sentirne parlare lo irrita profondamente. Seppure sia abituato a convivere con il surreale, Sirio ama le cose semplici e trova che la vera felicità sia nell’ordinario, assieme alle persone care. È strano che una persona del genere si ritrovi al Borgo, non vi pare? Forse in lui si nasconde molto di più che un semplice apprendista cuoco.

 

​KIM

“Provate anche solo a sfiorare la mia roba e vi troverete rivoltati dentro per fuori. Io vi ho avvertito.” -cit.

Kim è una programmatrice e si occupa di gestire la struttura del Borgo, impedendo che il suo continuo mutare lo porti al collasso. È estremamente schietta e distaccata, ha una pazienza senza pari e riesce a mantenere la calma anche nelle situazioni più difficili. Possiede un repertorio di imprecazioni pressoché immenso che usa a pieno regime quando arriva al limite di sopportazione con determinate persone o quando gioca ai MMORPG. Abita assieme a Maman, Anima ed Hormon nella Prima Casa. La si può considerare il vice sindaco del Borgo.

 

OBLAK & NEBE

“Se voi seguiste le regole, il nostro intervento non sarebbe necessario.” -cit. Oblak

Gemelle estremamente legate, Oblak e Nebe sono state cresciute ed istruite per diventare dei sicari di alto livello. Eseguono sempre ogni missione in modo perfetto, quasi fossero dei robot, e sono estremamente devote al loro superiore. Seppure agiscano sempre in sincrono, chi ha l’iniziativa tra le due è Oblak, che dimostra di avere il carattere che invece a Nebe sembra mancare del tutto. Ultimamente sono sulle tracce di Anima che gli ha procurato non pochi problemi, macchiando il loro curriculum perfetto.

 

ALASTOR

“L’equilibrio è alla base dell’esistenza, va preservato ad ogni costo e per questo importanti scelte devono essere fatte. Se non siete in grado di giudicare, allora io mi farò giudice per voi. Affidate a me le vostre vite.” -cit.

Conosciuta come la “Strega di metallo” Alastor è un eterna guerriera, reputata da molti una semi divinità. Persegue il concetto di giustizia ed equità come nessun altro e non ha pietà per chiunque le sia d’intralcio; alcuni dicono che per il bene di questi ideali abbia gettato via il suo stesso cuore. Appartiene ad un’organizzazione che preserva e protegge la razza umana, ma, seppure riceva ordini, il suo giudizio sul campo di battaglia è del tutto imparziale. Agisce prevalentemente in solitaria, ma da qualche tempo ha un paio di apprendiste ai suoi comandi, le uniche che sono riuscite a sopravvivere al suo metodo disumano.

 

TESLA

“Ah. Ho rotto di nuovo Internet.” -cit

Individuo molto ambiguo, Tesla è una tra le personalità più di spicco nella ricerca sul rapporto Demone/uomo e senza dubbio la più controversa. È stato accusato più volte di tradimento e diffamazione, ma i risultati delle sue ricerche sono così importanti da renderlo praticamente intoccabile. Protetto da una famosa organizzazione, conduce esperimenti sugli esseri umani, alla ricerca della Verità: la chiave che porterà all’evoluzione. Per quanto il suo operato potrebbe far trasparire l’opposto, Tesla ama incredibilmente gli esseri umani e passa molto del suo tempo a interagirvi su Internet: se per caso vi imbattete in grossi dibattiti e fenomeni virali, quasi sicuramente nell’occhio del ciclone c’è lui.

 

Il progetto

Anima affonda le radici estetiche in tutto quello scenario magico che spazia dal mondo dei videogiochi, Kingdom Hearts e Zelda in primis, al mondo dell’animazione: Evangelion, Kill la Kill, Gurren Lagann sono alcuni dei progetti più cari all’autrice. 
Lo stile tipicamente orientale e il gusto per la cultura del Sol Levante sono da sempre stati fonte d’ispirazione: nelle tavole respiriamo la delicatezza e il sapore del maestro Miyazaki ma anche forti rimandi a opere della Gainax come FLCL e Punta al Top 2! Diebuster. 
Molti stimoli anche da produzioni americane come Adventure Time e Steven Universe, dove elementi inverosimili e magia la fanno da padrone.

Anima sarà un albo cartonato a colori, di 92 pagine in formato 21 x 29,7 cm.

 

Un libro prodotto da Tatai Lab, ormai una garanzia di qualità nel mondo delle auto-produzioni targate Crowdfunding.

 

Come useremo questi fondi

Anima e' stato disegnato da Chiara e colorato da Lorenzo durante questi ultimi mesi, grazie al supporto del Tatai Lab 
Si tratta di 92 pagine ed e' tutto pronto, dobbiamo solo raccogliere i soldi per stampare e spedire.

 

I fondi verranno usati nel seguente modo:

€ 700 per le tasse e Indiegogo

€ 5.000 per la stampa e i gadget

€ 1.300 per la spedizione

 

Come posso aiutare?

Puoi aiutarci supportando il progetto o anche solamente condividendo la pagina Indiegogo sui diversi social network. Segui i nostri account: Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/KnowWhoYouAreAnima 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WhoYouAreAnima 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/animaproject/ 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/tatailab

Per quanto il suo operato potrebbe far trasparire l’opposto, Tesla ama incredibilmente gli esseri umani e passa molto del suo tempo a interagirvi su Internet: se per caso vi imbattete in grossi dibattiti e fenomeni virali, quasi sicuramente nell’occhio del ciclone c’è lui. Il progettoAnima affonda le radici estetiche in tutto quello scenario magico che spazia dal mondo dei videogiochi, Kingdom Hearts e Zelda in primis, al mondo dell’animazione: Evangelion, Kill la Kill, Gurren Lagann sono alcuni dei progetti più cari all’autrice. Lo stile tipicamente orientale e il gusto per la cultura del Sol Levante sono da sempre stati fonte d’ispirazione: nelle tavole respiriamo la delicatezza e il sapore del maestro Miyazaki ma anche forti rimandi a opere della Gainax come FLCL e Punta al Top 2! Diebuster. Molti stimoli anche da produzioni americane come Adventure Time e Steven Universe, dove elementi inverosimili e magia la fanno da padrone.Anima sarà un albo cartonato a colori, di 92 pagine in formato 21 x 29,7 cm. Un libro prodotto da Tatai Lab, ormai una garanzia di qualità nel mondo delle auto-produzioni targate Crowdfunding. Come useremo questi fondiAnima e' stato disegnato da Chiara e colorato da Lorenzo durante questi ultimi mesi, grazie al supporto del Tatai Lab Si tratta di 92 pagine ed e' tutto pronto, dobbiamo solo raccogliere i soldi per stampare e spedire. I fondi verranno usati nel seguente modo:€ 700 per le tasse e Indiegogo€ 5.000 per la stampa e i gadget€ 1.300 per la spedizione Come posso aiutare?Puoi aiutarci supportando il progetto o anche solamente condividendo la pagina Indiegogo sui diversi social network. Segui i nostri account: Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/KnowWhoYouAreAnima Twitter: https://twitter.com/WhoYouAreAnima Instagram: https://instagram.com/animaproject/ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/tatailab

story:
What is RISK!?

RISK! is a free podcast (podcast = internet radio show) and live show at which people tell true stories they never thought they'd dare to share in public – stories they’d normally just tell friends. RISK! has shows in New York and Los Angeles where a ton of talented folks such as Marc Maron, Margaret Cho, Lisa Lampanelli, Sarah Silverman, Michael Ian Black and many others have dropped their usual act and shown a whole new side of themselves.

The RISK! podcast features the best stories from our live shows, stories recorded in-studio and wonderful songs from a variety of musicians. Mashable.com said RISK! is one of the three best podcasts ever and Slate.com called it "jaw-dropping, hysterically funny, and just plain touching." The podcast currently averages 225,000 downloads a month, and fans write in regularly about how important the show is to them.

RISK!’s host and creator is Kevin Allison, a beloved comedian, storyteller, storytelling teacher and member of The State (the legendary sketch comedy group whose cult classic show aired on MTV in the 90’s).

www.RISK-Show.com

Why is RISK! doing a fund raiser?

Since August of 2009, RISK! has been operating on a budget of... well, almost nothing.

RISK! is a labor of love. We have a large team of people who each spend a tremendous amount of time making the RISK! podcast every week.

In addition to making the podcast, the RISK! team runs weekly free open story slams, produces 2-4 monthly live shows around the USA, runs a storytelling school, and does everything it can to keep a This American Life-style show running without a This American Life-style budget of any kind. We don’t have enough income to cover our payroll costs, let alone our additional costs for website maintenance, bandwidth for the podcast, publicity and marketing, touring, class space rental, and on and on and on. So now, we’re doing a public radio-style fundraiser here on IndieGoGo.com to keep RISK! running.

Until now, we’ve been getting by on favors, miracles, volunteers, a small amount of advertising income and one large donation from one of our biggest fans, but the till is almost  empty, and the last thing we want to do is close shop.

What happens if RISK! gets fully funded?

If we reach or exceed our fund raising goal, we will be able to keep bringing you amazing stories on the RISK! podcast and at our live shows all around the country so you can keep listening from anywhere in the world and come see us in person as well.

Where The Money Goes

The RISK! team is based mainly in New York City and Los Angeles, where life isn’t cheap. The money you donate will help us to cover the cost of paying our amazing team members so they can afford to keep working with us, as well as allow us to step up our touring, marketing and publicity efforts, which will help to make the show more financially sustainable, and in turn make it easier for us to continue to collect and share amazing stories from around the world with you, our audience, each week.

Right now, RISK! is a totally independent operation. With your financial support, we can improve our recording equipment to give you a better-sounding show for a more pleasurable listening experience. We can put more effort into getting out on the road and bringing a live RISK! show to your hometown. We can stop worrying about how to pay our bills and get back to doing all we can to constantly improve our fans’ favorite show.

Ok, so what do I get if I give to RISK!?

The rewards you get for donating to RISK!’s fund raising campaign are one-of-a-kind gifts that you can’t get anywhere else, and that you’ll want to run out and tell all your friends about. Check out the right side of this page for all the rewards you can get for donations of anywhere from $10 to $10,000, and everywhere in between.

story:
Short Summary

Do you Like Comics? Do you like music? So do we!

About this time last year some friends threw out the idea of doing a comic anthology all about music. A lot of our friends were into comics and had also been in bands or involved in music in some way and we wanted to bring our passions for both to a joint project.

From that Bandthology was born!

We launched a modest pledge drive and we were able to print and sell 300 copies of our 36 page debut!

This year we would like to have a bigger print run and have invited even more of our musical/artistic friends to join in!

Bandthology 2

Full color cover by Brian Churilla (DB Cooper)

40 interior black and white pages with contributions by;

Aaron Pittman, Tony Maldonado, Greg Sorkin, Lauren Burke, Bobgar Ornelas, Wendi Freeman, Mat Nixon, Jon Westhoff, Matt Collander, Andrew Vanderbilt, Dan Dougherty, Don Cardenas

Release date is February 2013

 

Bandthology@gmail.com with questions or retailer quotes

Funding

What we need is money to print the book and help us pay for the cover art and shipping.

That's all.

I'm sure a lot of you reading this know, small press printing can be expensive. Some of our contirbuotrs are professional, but most are not. In all cases, there is no pay going to the contributors, but the more copies we can print, the more they can use to promote their art or sell at local shows.

All incentives are being donated by these dedicated contributors and no money from this fundraiser goes towards those items(ie CDs, shirts etc). A small amount will go to printing issues purchased of Bandthology 1.

More about the book

Like last years book, the great teams(and 2 new comers) are free to contribute any story they can think up from the world of music.

Last years book ranged from sci-fi to slice of life to kung-fu and beyond. This year will, no doubt, be even more expansive.

We invited people who are passionate about music and comics and our cover artists are no different.

Last year saw Ryan Kelly capture so much we have all felt playing shows and this year we asked artist/metal head Brian Churilla to share his love of both mediums.

 

 

Some love from last years book:

"Just read Bandthology, a great indie love letter to the highs and lows of being a creative person" -Ryan Schrodt (Dear Dinosaur)

"Bandthologyis for everyone who hates the music scene but loves the music making scene! Honest, imaginative and you are sure to find yourself in one the stories if not a few. Only way the book could be better is if it was printed on vinyl." John Littrel (Burnt Weiners podcast)

"Anthology in the best sense of the word. STories with a variety of style and tone. Perfect for fans of music or comics." Andrew Sandford (The LA Rabbit)

 "Bandthology is to comics as George Clinton is to funk, and is diverse as Tom Morello is on a guitar." Shawn Pryor, Action Lab Entertainment

add $5 to any pledge to add Bandthology 1 to your order-please note at time of order-thank you

The book is being published through our small press comapny- King Bone Press. http://kingbonepress.storenvy.com

 

All orders of $15 or more include a PDF copy- All Canadian shipping add $13 and elsewhere add $18

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, please tell a friend or share in your favorite social media. 

 

Thank you so much for looking.

Rock on.

story:
Hi, My name is Mike S. Miller.

I'm a 27 year veteran of the comic book industry, best known for my work on the Injustice Series for DC Comics, and Game of Thrones covers and prequel series based on Dunk and Egg. I've spent my career chasing deadlines, trying to do 'my best' with the time I was given. But now, with the advent of crowd funding, I've been able to take my time and do my BEST work EVER. 

Mike S Miller cover

Hoang Nguyen cover

Canaan White cover

Randy Green Cover

So what am I doing? I'm starting a universe. The Blacklist Universe. Heroes you can believe in! And the first hero is LONESTAR! A character I created years ago actually as a foil for a supervillain that could not be stopped, the evil IRON CROSS. WW2 Germany's Ubermensche!  Great heroes are defined by great villains, so the idea of taking my greatest villain and making a hero to fight him, instead of the other way around seemed inspired!  Of course, he is a patriot, fighting Nazis will do that, and the comparisons to Captain America aren't unfounded. They are both WW2 era fighting men given super powers. But that's where the comparison ends. Lonestar is drafted into a war against the dark creatures of the night as he becomes the founding member of the UNKNOWN SOLDIERS! Other 'fallen' soldiers who take up arms against the nightmares that haunt our world.  So I would say it's 'Captain America meets Van Helsing', with a heart. 

The first campaign for Lonestar was HEART of the HERO on Indiegogo, and it did $113,000. And I am almost sold out of that book through my second campaign, Lonestar: Soul of the Soldier. So I decided to bring my second printing of Heart of the Hero back to Indiegogo with all new covers and a brand new 8-page origin story of BRANDO by upcoming superstar Matthew Weldon!!! 

Preview pages from HEART of the HERO!

Hope you enjoyed this preview! Here's some of the covers!

Kyle Ritter Cover

 

Elliot Fernandez Cover Inks (to be colored)

Matthew Weldon Cover (to be colored)

 

 

Caanan White Cover (to be colored)

Aaron Lopresti cover (to be colored)

Kevin Sharpe cover (to be colored)

Randy Green cover (to be colored)

 

#jawbreakers #graveyardshift #expendables #cyberfrog #bigfootbill #earthwormjim icarus and the sun #icarusandthesun jim lee justice league dc comics injustice scurry cash grab

SPAWN #SPAWN #MCFARLANE #TODDMCFARLANE KICKSTARTER #KICKSTARTER #seangordonmurphy #plotholes sean gordon murphy sean murphy the plot holes

story:
Short Summary

Hope Flood is one of the top comedians in the industry with her commitment and dedication to comedians in comedy as well as her numerous ventures to keep them upwardly mobile in the entertainment business. Hope has had a successful career in comedy for over 25 years. Surviving in any business for 25 years is an accomplishment within itself, especially in the male dominated business of comedy. Hope has accumulated a wealth of knowledge as she has paved the way for up and coming comics and has been inspired to pass her experience on.

This inspiration is what gave birth to the Females In Comedy Association (FICA).

FICA is a group designed for the comediennes to develop, refine and build on their craft as they learn how to break into or to stay in the business. FICA’s sole purpose is for comediennes to network, mentor, and collaborate with one another as they learn to implement the skills of success.  This group has spread world-wide and gained the attention of many comediennes all over the globe from the novice to the established seasoned professional. The only requirement is that you must be a Female Comedian who is open to learning and growing.

The Females in Comedy Convention (FICC) brings awareness and exposure to the talents of male/females in comedy.

Although the convention was originally branded as the Females in Comedy Convention, it is the vision of founder Hope Flood to include ALL COMEDIANS regardless of gender.

The FICC  will bring together comedians for all across the US and Canada for six days of educational and career advancing opportunities. With intensive and accelerated workshops, seminars and information sessions, industry attended showcases, a variety of networking events and exposure in some of the top comedy clubs in LA.


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $10,000 to cover the expenses of production. Needless to say producing a convention of this magnitude is no small feat and there is great cost involved. One of FICC’s main goals is to be able to allow all comedians who wish to take advantage of this opportunity to participate regardless of their ability to pay.

We would like to provide partial scholarships based on the financial needs of the comedians so we can provide professional support for as many as possible. FICA supplemented the fees of 50% of the women who attended the 2013 convention.

Details of the convention please go to: www.femalesincomedyconvention.com

If you know of any  comedians that you feel can benefit from this convention please feel free to have them contact us.

The Impact

Your contributions will support  live comedy and keep the laughter alive. With all the stress and challenges that life can present us with, laughter is healing and the best medicine that can be prescribed. In addition a portion of this fundraising campaign funds will also go to A NICKEL OF HOPE, INC - a mentoring program for at-risk girls in the Los Angeles & surrounding areas. Go to www.anickelofhope.org for details.

TESTIMONIAL:




Other Ways You Can Help

    • Share this campaign to all comedy lovers and supporters of the arts and live entertainment.
    • Share this campaign with all your friends, family,co-workers, neighbors etc.
    • No contribution is too big or too small
    • Some of your donations may be tax deductible
    • If you would like to be a sponsor of the 2014 FICC, a full sponsorship package can be downloaded by clicking on this link:http://bit.ly/1cjTCWR

HERE ARE THE PERKS:

Your choice of a Female Comics Rock, Comics Rock, Black Comics Rock, or FICA 4Lyfe T-shirt. 

Vintage comedy poster

Hope Flood Comedy DVD

Roy Wood Jr. Prank Call CD's


   

Nephew Tommy CD's

VIP tickets to the Comedy Slam Celebrity Hoop Jam in Los Angeles.

Saturday, April 26th from 11AM-4PM @ Southwest College

(If you dont live in Los Angeles you can donate them to a disadvantaged youth)


 We THANK YOU for your support, your time, and your donation.

story:
We have passed the goal!

Thank you all backers!!!


The book is also available in Swedish - 'TOKIGA BIBELORD' 

Nutty Bible Quotes is a book with fun illustrations of some rare bible verses.

"I tell everyone the fast track to atheism is to read the bible.  
This book is a faster track . . . and it has pictures."  
- Penn Jillette, Penn & Teller.

The purpose is to amuse, enlighten and get people to think and talk about the actual content in the worlds most influential book - The 'Holy' Bible.

The book will have a softcover with 128 pages containing 50 nutty bible quotes with fun and vivid illustrations divided into 7 chapters (categories). This also includes a gallery describing 6 biblical celebrities and 15 interesting or fun bible facts as an extra bonus.

The book will also be available in Swedish - 'TOKIGA BIBELORD'.

Go to Penn Jillette's tweet on Nutty Bible Quotes.


Recommendation by Steve Wells.
Creator and author of The Skeptic's Annotated Bible


To be able to finish the project I need to reach the $9000 goal . 
The fundings will go to let my illustrator complete the work.  It will also enable me to get the book out for publishing at Amazon.com.

The book will be included in most of the perks. At $5 you can get it as an E-book.


I'm a former Christian believer  who was deeply engaged in the church.
Now I am working as a magician / entertainer and are a skeptic.

Doing an inspection of the Bible I got stunned by the dignity of the madness to be found in the holy scripture. I want to share the knowledge in a fun way.

I've found just the right illustrator. He is a professional illustrator with the right approach, understanding and humor. To make an awesome book it's crucial that I can work with this illustrator who understand just my take on this. I need the funds to be able to let him do the whole book with me. 

If the funding will succeed we will be able to self publish the book for distribution over the globe in a couple of months. 




Since many people relate to the Bible, the book is the most influential book in our society. I think it is important that people know what is in it. 

Studies shows that only 10% of Christians have read the Bible. Yet many people take it as a literal truth. Surely it is important that we know what is in it. Please take part with me on this project, to enlighten the world and get some laughs on the way.

If people don't read the Bible they will only hear the cherry picked parts served to them by the churches. Well, here are my cherry picked quotes. All quotes, of course, come with the Bible reference so you and everyone else can read it in its context. 

Bright authors like Sam Harris, Christopher Hitchens, Richard Dawkins, Steve Wells and many more, have written brilliant books that scrutinize the writings in the bible on a deeper level. 
My intention is to make the knowledge easy to digest, and available for everyone. I think humor is a good way. I want it to be fun to read and easy to share.

If we get the book out, it will not just make my dream come true, it will give us a tool too to extend the perspective on the holy scripture and religion. 


E-BOOK

This digital version of Nutty Bible Quotes is available as an E-book for the Kindle E-book Reader. You can also read the E-book using iOS, Android, Windows and Mac with the free Kindle app.

YOUR NAME

Some perks also include your name published on the official website with my grateful thanks. This is optional and you will be asked by e-mail. Your name will be listed with all other fellow backers in my special backers section on the website www.nuttybiblequotes.com/backers. 

LANGUAGE

Nutty Bible Quotes are in English by default. It is optional to get the book in Swedish. 
You will get the possibility to make this choice by e-mail after we have received your contribution.

SHIPPING

To get the book or books to your location please add 
the following amount  to your chosen perk:

Within USA:  Add $0  

Alaska,Hawaii and Poerto Rico: Add $2 

Europe: Add $2 

Canada: Add $3 

Asia: Add $4 

Australia: Add $4 

South America: Add $4 

Africa: Add $8 

From another place of the "flat" earth? 
Please contribute with reason as the good backer you are. Thanks!

Yes, the same amount is applied regardless of the number of books included for chosen perk. So, if you went for the "Preacher" to get 10 books the shipping will be down to ¢30 cents per book.


Forgot the shipping fee? 

Don't worry. You're not going to hell for it. Just be an Angel and add the appropriate fee using the Angel perk. This is what you do. 

  • Find the shipping list further down on this page. 
  • Find your country or continent and the shipping fee. 
  • Choose the Angel perk or "Contribute Now".
  • Change the $1 to your appropriate shipping fee. 
  • Use the same name and address as your previously chosen perk. 
  • Done. Thank you!

I've noticed generous backers that simply missed or forgot to add this fee. You will also be notified by email. Sorry for the inconvenience. 


I'll be happy for any feedback on this campaign and project.
Something you miss in the information?
Suggestion of perks?
Ways to spread the word?

Anything is welcome.

Please spread the word!
Maybe you won't fund today for any reason. It's still worth much if you just contribute by sharing!
I've gathered some sharing materials here >>

Thank you very much!

/Jakob

Follow and interact with Nutty Bible Quotes at Twitter, Facebook and YouTube, below.

Creator and author of The Skeptic's Annotated BibleTo be able to finish the project I need to reach the $9000 goal . The fundings will go to let my illustrator complete the work.  It will also enable me to get the book out for publishing at Amazon.com.The book will be included in most of the perks. story:
Hi! I'm Jeffery Self. I write, perform, and talk about Marcia Gay Harden way too often. I've decided to take all those things and combine them together for my new web series. I won't JUST talk about Marcia Gay Harden but every inch of the pop culture that I'm unhealthily obsessed with. That said, if I WERE going to talk about Marcia Gay Harden I'd tell you the story of when I met her in 2009. Lets just say ONE OF US was drinking too much red wine. And it wasn't Marcia Gay Harden. 

My new show will be a hybrid of classic talk shows and 1980's children's TV like Pee Wee's Playhouse and Mr. Roger's Neighborhood. Each episode will feature a celebrity guest and some funny sketches. It'll be funny, weird, and your Dad might not get it. 

Here's what I need! SOME HELP! 
I need to rent a studio space, some sound/light/camera equipment, hire a director, get a website designed, and pay off the money Marcia Gay Harden loaned me when I got sorta out of control one night in 2009 (not really, I already paid her back) 

If there's anything you can throw my way... a buck, two, ten, fifty, a gazillion. I'm trying to reach my goal of $2,500. 

I'd love to see my show eventually make it to television and I think the internet is a good place to start. It worked once before when my friend Cole and I turned our VGL Boys videos into two seasons of "Jeffery and Cole Casserole" on the Logo Network.  So help me out and be a part of my next venture into making the world a weirder place. There are some perks for those who donate. Check them out!

story:
RED XMAS: JINGLE HELL! is a 48-page, perfect-bound comic book concluding the series critics call: 

From ELF to Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer to "The Hanakkuh Song"... the holiday special is a staple of nearly all media.

We've set out to create one for comics. And with all the craziness going on in the world right now, we need a little Christmas. Right this very minute.

But unlike the Hallmark marathon, this Christmas tale ain't for kids. 

Here's the pitch:

"When Mrs. Claus dies in a tragic toy accident, Santa sets out to make all those little brats pay. Now, a Santa-skeptic FBI agent must team up with her wannabe-elf ex-husband to save their son--and Christmas!"

In addition to the super-sized 40-page main story, the book includes:

  • Exclusive bonus material
  • FREE U.S. SHIPPING!
  • Digital making-of material and theme song

 

Plus: catch up on the full series with our RED XMAS: TRIPLE PLAY.

When Mrs. Claus dies in a tragic toy accident...

Santa loses his s#!t on the town of Christmas, Vermont...

And while FBI agent Ellie Tewskberry tries--and fails--to bring him down...

Her son, Byron, runs away to the North Pole to find his dad, a wannabe elf who left the family years ago. Instead, Byron finds trouble:

Desperate to find her son, Ellie infiltrates A.S.S.--The American Santa Society--the national Union for Mall Santas. Soon, she finds herself fighting an age-old war alongside some... colorful allies.

But Santa escapes justice again. And just when all seems lost, Ellie's estranged husband re-appears... 

 

And now...

 

Still not sure?

Try before you buy!

Wanna download the first issue free?

WHY, JUST CLICK HERE!

Or click this obnoxious yellow button:

 

Miss Any of Our Previous RED XMAS Campaigns?

Catch up with our 72-page RED XMAS: TRIPLE PLAY, reprinting our NEARLY SOLD OUT first three issues. 

By choosing any "Ketchup Tier", you get the full story in one big pop. 

 

Variants

Our standard cover by Fabio Ramacci and Ilaria Chiocca took our breath away. But we know you collectors like your variants.

First up is our "Lady and the Tramp" variant by colorist Emilio Pilliu, which depicts the, uh, reunion of Ellie and her husband, Witherspoon.  

Uh, careful, Ellie. That sauce is hot.

Next up is an exclusive variant by artist Gian Carlo Bernal of Crescent City Monsters fame. If you've read CCM, you know this guy can draw!

 

The Process Junkie Edition

Available as an add-on to any print tier: a B&W print version of some of the digital process rewards included in all tiers. The full script printed alongside the layouts, with some of the 'naked' inks to boot, so you can see how a book like RED XMAS comes together. 70-pages minimum (likely more), extremely limited edition, hand-numbered and signed by Clay. 

 

 

Last year's book, RED XMAS: SILENT, BUT DEADLY, NIGHT!, came out great.

Readers loved it... 

In fact, the book was such a hit, we almost sold out of the entire print run this year!

This issue, Santa's going down. Ready to join the fight?

Or, just listen to these fine people of exquisite taste: 

FRIED Comics is a proud purveyor of offbeat, irreverent pulp fiction since 2013, and a labor of love for Clay Adams and Alexandre O. Philippe.

So far, we have seven successful Kickstarters under our belts. (And between us we have a lot of belts. ) So, we're stoked to return to the scene of the crime.

Clay Adams is a writer and filmmaker who's funded six projects on Kickstarter with FRIED Comics. His directorial debut, THE BOY SCOUT, was nominated for Best Short at the Golden Egg Film Festival in Los Angeles, and his feature script, THE ECLIPSE, placed second in the horror category of the FADEIn Awards. He has written and directed for television and holds a BFA in Dramatic Writing from NYU. When Clay first met Alexandre, he thought, "My, what a sophisticated European." Boy, was he wrong!

Film nerd/director Alexandre's most recent movie is 78/52, an acclaimed documentary about the shower scene in Psycho, playing theaters now. He holds a Masters Degree in Dramatic Writing from NYU’s Tisch School of the Arts and has written and directed numerous award-winning films and documentaries, including THE PEOPLE vs. GEORGE LUCAS, DOC OF THE DEAD, and THE LIFE AND TIMES OF PAUL THE PSYCHIC OCTOPUS. When Alexandre first met Clay, he thought, "My, what a stupid American." Boy, was he right!

Fabio comes to us from Rome, Italy, where he has published with Star Comics and Sergio Bonelli Editore. He recently contributed to the horror anthology Modern Dread, which was successfully funded on Kickstarter. Our resident Italian Stallion likes alt rock and (we assume) makes a great cappuccino, but all indications are that he ain't that Fabio.

Ilaria is an Italian comic artist and colorist. She has published two euro-manga style books with Kasaobake as co-author and co-artist; she's done a bunch of covers as a digital painter and now she's working as a colorist for many secret projects worldwide - no joke!

Ryan is a writer, artist, and alum of the The Comics Experience School. He successfully Kickstarted his debut comic, SUNMAKER, and contributed art to the ComixTribe column 'The Proving Grounds.'  He loves Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, ninjas, teens, mutants and turtles.

In the grand tradition of failing upwards, Mick has turned not bathing into a signature look and doodling into a paying gig. Trophy husband/father by day and night, the little moments here and there are devoted to the doodling. Having successfully funded a Kickstarter of his own (ROVERS), and with books to be published next year, Mick is in danger of enough success he might have to shower again.

Ugh. Just... ugh.

But enough about us. You wanna see...

 

The Package

We've gotten our fair share of comics that arrived mangled by the mail carrier.

You pay premium prices on Kickstarter, and you deserve better. That's why we've started using Gemini Comic Mailers:

These babies are sturdy. They require a little more money, a little more time (and a lot more tape!) but it's worth it to make sure your comics arrive in pristine condition.

And if somehow your comic still gets roughed up?

Frieda will replace it free of charge. 

 

Why Crowdfund?

We've already covered production costs. Now we're seeking extra funds to cover the cost of printing. 

By supporting this project, you're joining us as producers. In return, you'll receive our exclusive perks, credit in the book, behind-the-scenes "making-of" material, and early access to the finished story.   

 

Fair enough. Where will all the money go?

Photo: (c) Can Stock Photo / pressmaster Photo: (c) Can Stock Photo / pressmaster

First, we'll put it in a big pile and dive in, Scrooge McDuck-style.

Then we'll print the book and ship it to you.

If we're fortunate enough to raise more than our goal, we'll use that money towards production of the RED XMAS collected edition later this year. 

Hoo-ray! Win-win.

 

Our Evil Plan:

Digital Rewards Released: Late April/Early May

Book Goes to Printer: April/May

Book Printed and shipped to Fried Diner ~Apr 30

"$#it happens" buffer - 1 month (~May 31)

Frieda and our sweatshop workers (AKA Frieda's kids) pack and ship - (~June 1-June 30)

Expected delivery to US backers - 2 Weeks (Early July)

Expected delivery for International Backers - 4 Weeks (late July)

 

Thanks, Hon!

We're not asking for a million dollars.

We just want to give you some holiday cheer (in July), put a cool book in your hand, and entertain you for a bit.

So find a pledge level you like and pre-order. We'll make more comics.

Thanks for supporting! And remember...

Risks and challenges

Any crowdfunding campaign comes with risk, and especially with the coronavirus and resulting shutdowns, our timeline may have to shift a bit. 

But know this: we have a track record of finishing what we start. This is our seventh crowdfunding project--all have been funded and fulfilled on time. The book is well into production already, and we're confident we'll make our schedule.

story:
Wawawiwa nació en el 2010 como un hobby, con dibujos inclinados al humor absurdo. Durante 6 increíbles años se ha ido transformado en un trampolín que nos ha impulsado a ver más allá gracias a la aceptación que ha tenido en las redes sociales, y como consecuencia un mayor alcance. 

Sin embargo sigue siendo un emprendimiento familiar que solo ha podido atender la demanda en Colombia por medio de nuestra tienda virtual. Es por ello, que hemos decidido iniciar este proyecto para cruzar las fronteras habilitando los envíos internacionales y lograr estar al alcance de todos ustedes. 

 

Qué mejor manera de celebrar este gran paso, que trayendo a la vida a 'Toki', el conejo de Wawawiwa, un hermoso y sarcástico peluche de 20cm acompañado de jugosas recompensas, dependiendo del paquete que elijas. Nuestro objetivo es fabricar al menos 500 peluches.

 

 

Puedes participar en nuestra pre-venta eligiendo una de las recompensas (PERKS) que hemos armado para ti.

 

Quiero comprar desde afuera de Colombia ¿Cuánto cuesta el envío?

El monto del envío te será cobrado automáticamente al momento de hacer la compra. El total viene siendo: 'Costo de la recompensa' + USD$11 (costo de envío internacional).

¿Cómo y cuándo se entregarán las recompensas?

Todo el dinero recaudado será utilizado para cubrir un 5% de comisión a indiegogo, el costo de producción de la mercancía y el envío a cada persona que ha pagado por una determinada recompensa.

La fecha de envío de cada producto depende de la cantidad de los pedidos que recibamos, pero no debe sobrepasar los 45 días una vez finalizado el proyecto. Para tu tranquilidad estaremos publicando fotos e información actualizada periódicamente de todo el proceso.

 

 

¿Y si el proyecto supera la meta?

Si alcanzamos la meta, aparte de estar extremadamente agradecidos con todos por formar parte de esta campaña, queremos agregar algo extra a nuestra recompensa digital. Todos los que aportaron a la campaña recibirán también un video exclusivo cada 2 semanas mostrando el proceso de creación de una ilustración de wawawiwa. Son 4 videos en total a los que tendrás acceso.

¿Qué sucede con mi dinero si el proyecto no alcanza la meta?

Hemos elegido la opción de 'meta flexible' al crear el proyecto. Lo que significa que pase lo que pase, el proyecto se llevará a cabo. Es decir, si no alcanzamos nuestra meta de 500 peluches, iniciaremos la producción para aquellos peluches que sí lograron conseguir un hogar. 

 

¿Cuáles son los riesgos del proyecto?

Wawawiwa trabaja conjuntamente con fabricantes con los que venimos ejecutando proyectos desde hace varios años y damos fe de su responsabilidad con el cumplimiento en los plazos de entrega, sin embargo, si somos optimistas y se sobrepasa la meta por un monto significativo, la cantidad de pedidos puede exceder el estimado de recompensas a fabricar y enviar, lo que podría generar una extensión del periodo de entrega a 15 días adicionales al tiempo establecido previamente.

 

 

Acerca del creador:

Soy Andrés J. Colmenares, diseñador gráfico e ilustrador. Mi ideas surgen de conversaciones que escucho en la calle, frases de películas, libros, objetos de la vida cotidiana… Cualquier cosa que sienta que podría ser utilizado para contar una historia. A veces siento que no estoy inventando nada, sino que simplemente estoy combinando diferentes cosas que veo en el mundo. 

Reír me hace feliz, y es lo que me motiva a hacer mis dibujos. La única regla que tengo para trabajar en una ilustración es que me haga reír o por lo menos, que me cause gracia. Los que me conocen dirán que no me río muy seguido, pero créanme, mentalmente siempre lo hago. 

Contactar al creador:

Si tienes cualquier pregunta no dudes en escribirnos.
mail: compras@wawawiwadesign.com
story_txt:
Wawawiwa nació en el 2010 como un hobby, con dibujos inclinados al humor absurdo. Durante 6 increíbles años se ha ido transformado en un trampolín que nos ha impulsado a ver más allá gracias a la aceptación que ha tenido en las redes sociales, y como consecuencia un mayor alcance. 
Sin embargo sigue siendo un emprendimiento familiar que solo ha podido atender la demanda en Colombia por medio de nuestra tienda virtual. Es por ello, que hemos decidido iniciar este proyecto para cruzar las fronteras habilitando los envíos internacionales y lograr estar al alcance de todos ustedes. 


 
Qué mejor manera de celebrar este gran paso, que trayendo a la vida a 'Toki', el conejo de Wawawiwa, un hermoso y sarcástico peluche de 20cm acompañado de jugosas recompensas, dependiendo del paquete que elijas. Nuestro objetivo es fabricar al menos 500 peluches.
 

 
Puedes participar en nuestra pre-venta eligiendo una de las recompensas (PERKS) que hemos armado para ti.

 
Quiero comprar desde afuera de Colombia ¿Cuánto cuesta el envío?
El monto del envío te será cobrado automáticamente al momento de hacer la compra. El total viene siendo: 'Costo de la recompensa' + USD$11 (costo de envío internacional).
¿Cómo y cuándo se entregarán las recompensas?

Todo el dinero recaudado será utilizado para cubrir un 5% de comisión a indiegogo, el costo de producción de la mercancía y el envío a cada persona que ha pagado por una determinada recompensa.

La fecha de envío de cada producto depende de la cantidad de los pedidos que recibamos, pero no debe sobrepasar los 45 días una vez finalizado el proyecto. Para tu tranquilidad estaremos publicando fotos e información actualizada periódicamente de todo el proceso.

A veces siento que no estoy inventando nada, sino que simplemente estoy combinando diferentes cosas que veo en el mundo. 
Reír me hace feliz, y es lo que me motiva a hacer mis dibujos. La única regla que tengo para trabajar en una ilustración es que me haga reír o por lo menos, que me cause gracia. Los que me conocen dirán que no me río muy seguido, pero créanme, mentalmente siempre lo hago.

story:
Did you know?

The following bonus material is GUARANTEED to be added to the book once we reach our $5000 funding goal--no stretch goals required! 

The Sketchables Digital Sketchbook: a PDF file will be emailed to ALL BACKERS containing character designs, promotional materials, behind-the-scenes production pics showing the evolution of a page from pencils to inks, the FULL Abductables comic book script, and director's commentary from the creators! 

Community Art Gallery: Extra pages will be added to the book that feature fan art from YOU, the readers! Start sending in your stuff--this is your chance to see your artwork in print! 

Thank You Page: An additional credits page will be added to the book, dedicated to listing the names or screennames of ALL our beloved backers! This is our way of saying THANK YOU for helping make The Abductables a reality! 

Stretch Goals!

**UNLOCKED**: Backmatter Content! Additional pages will be added to the book containing illustrated character bios, worldbuilding, plot insights, and more!

$8,000: Print Pinup! A cardstock quality PRINT PINUP featuring Abductables artwork will be included for ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS!

$10,000: Stickers! Full color STICKERS featuring Abductables artwork will be included for ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS!

$12,000: Bookmarks! A BOOKMARK featuring Abductables artwork will be included for ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS!

$15,000: Trading card! A full color TRADING CARD featuring Abductables artwork will be included for ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS!

$20,000: Squarebound Printing! The Abductables will be upgraded from a standard floppy comic book to a full-blown TRADE PAPERBACK!

$30,000: FULL COLOR! A professional colorist will be hired to render all 52 pages in glorious FULL COLOR! 

$50,000: **MYSTERY ITEM** A top secret item will be included for ALL PHYSICAL BACKERS! What could it be?! Trust me, you're gonna want to find out! 

 

Short Summary

As a child of the '90s raised on UFO conspiracy books and one-too-many episodes of The X-Files, the question I ended up raising in my late-twenties was perhaps inevitable: what would happen if the victims of alien abduction actually fought back against their extraterrestrial captors?

Couple that with visions of a roid-rage Arnold Schwarzenegger-clone beating the crap out of a bunch of pot-bellied, bobble-headed Greys and, well, the rest is history. 

The Abductables is that original idea finally brought to fruition--as both a tribute to my alien-obsessed youth and as a mission statement on how I want comics to be: funny, violent, dramatic, bombastic--with maybe a tear-jerking moment or two thrown in for good measure.  

Of course, bringing my ridiculous notions of intergalactic mayhem to life would be impossible without a draftsman who shares my irreverent sensibilities.

Enter: Ibai Canales (insert probe joke here)--an amazing artist who not only appreciates my sick sense of humor, but also produces the kind of expressionistic cartooning this project needs to land the jokes and sell the fights. And as you can see with these preview pages--Mr. Canales does so in spades! 

By funding this project, you'll help bring the outlandish vision of two independent comic creators to life in physical form--and provide yourself with quality entertainment in the process! 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the good news: all the artwork for the book is ALREADY complete! This means a faster turnaround time for our backers!

The $5000 funding goal is calculated to cover the cost of ordering a healthy print run of the 52 page Abductables comic book, as well as quality shipping supplies, domestic & (ridiculously expensive) international postage, bags & boards, and any other ancillary fees that will no doubt pop up in the fulfillment stage of this campaign. 

(We also need to set some money aside for Canales's beer fund--surely a worthy cause!)

The perks of this campaign are designed to give you options--some prefer their comics digital, others like to tear into a physical copy and devour it cover-to-cover, and others still are all about collecting (and possibly reselling!) their pristine first edition copy.

Whatever your preference, we've got you covered! 

The Impact

Both the medium and the industry of comic books are just a small satellite in comparison to the planetary behemoth that is pop culture at large. As such, independent creators such as myself and Canales have it especially rough when trying to bring our wacky ideas to life. Without corporate backing or the infrastructure of an established comic book company to do the heavy lifting, we need your help to print the book ourselves and send it directly to you, the reader! 

While this is my first official crowdfunding campaign, Canales's track record speaks for itself, as his previous Indiegogo campaign Iron Sights (in collaboration with the great Richard C. Meyer, aka Ya Boi Zack) reached the vaunted Six Figures and managed to crack the Top 10 of that year's sales charts!

Because this is my first crowdfunding venture, I take my responsibility to provide you with a high quality book promptly and efficiently very seriously--after all, you only get one first impression! 

Risks & Challenges

Let's be frank: the worst case scenario is that we don't get funded. Should that happen, you'll be refunded your contribution and the book will unfortunately not see print.

Ah, but what if we do reach our goal? Well, that's when the real challenge begins! I'm not naïve: I've studied previous campaigns and have seen the trials and tribulations, mistakes and miscalculations made by other creators, and I owe them a great debt by learning from their mistakes.

While this process will certainly be a learning experience for me, I'm confident in my ability to roll with the punches and deliver the goods come hell or high water!

And while I intend to maintain complete transparency and accountability throughout the funding and fulfilment process, know this: once we reach our initial funding goal, you are GUARANTEED to get your book--no matter what!

Other Ways You Can Help

Believe me, I know what it's like to be strapped for cash. If you simply can't afford to back the book--no worries! If money's tight and you still want to see this project succeed, do me a favor and help spread the word! 

Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and any other newfangled social media the kids are into these days--let's make this campaign go VIRAL!

Tell your friends, your coworkers, your mom and dad, meemaw and peepaw--even your creepy uncle who just got out of prison! (Okay, maybe not him, but you get the idea.)

And please, use the Indiegogo share tools!

Follow Michael Derrick on social media:

TWITTER:

http://twitter.com/cauldroncomics

YOUTUBE:

http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWqkQ6yQVTZR1JneLzeUFcw/featured

BLOG:

http://cauldroncomics.blogspot.com/

Follow Ibai Canales on social media:

GAB:

http://gab.com/canalus

YOUTUBE:

http://www.youtube.com/user/Canalus/featured

FACEBOOK:

http://www.facebook.com/ibai.canales

story:
WELCOME
The Tribulation Taskforce is a fresh, new take on the superhero genre!
I love superheroes. My influences are Legion of Superheroes, Silverwolf comics (Legion-X), The Sentinels of Justice from AC comics, X-Men and Sc-fi like Doctor Who, The Tomorrow People and   Eureka!
​
I hope you will give our books a shot and support our love for comic books!

Bill Raupp
Creator of The Tribulation Taskforce

 

THE TRIBULATION TASKFORCE

The Bible tells of a coming period of great turmoil, referred to by many as the End of Days.
     ​
     The soon to come antichrist is on a mission to bring forth the last days before the appointed time. Under a platform of world peace, he uses his position in the United Nations to assemble a team of Super powered warriors to help him achieve his true goal, the destruction of mankind.

The heroes Grok and the Apostle John scour the globe and assembles a society of heroes to stop the anti-christ's premature ascension.

     Together they will assemble the greatest Superhero force the world has ever seen.  
     ​They are   THE TRIBULATION TASKFORCE!

Http://www.TribulationTaskforce.com

 

THE SECRET FILES

The rapture event has occurred and millions of people  have been removed from the Earth.

The new world leader Apollyon has taken control of the Earth’s governments. With his enforcers, The Watchers, The world have become a very different place.

What follows are excerpts from Tribulation Taskforce leader Grok’s journals. These journals are very critical to the remnant who are being put to death.

Learn more about the world of Tribulation Taskforce through stories, journal entries and character profiles.

story:
Morgan Le Fay was one of the most powerful fay. After a battle with Merlin she woke up powerless in the modern world. Determined to get her powers back she has decided to work as a PI for the Fay World in order to find clues on what happened to her.

This is a modern take on the classic villain from Arthurian legend brought into the present in an urban setting. Ever wonder what Jessica Jones would be like if she happened to be a powerful Fay sorceress? That's Le Fay in a nutshell.

Joshua Metzger - Writer/Creator

Writes the crime comics Punch Drunk (Arcana Comics) and Metzger and Pawlak Presents: Villain (Evoluzione Publishing).

Marcel Dupree - Writer/Creator

Owns and operates Evoluzione Publishing, which produces comics.  He also edited Punch Drunk from Arcana Comics.

Miguel Angel Ruiz - Artist

Miguel Angel Ruiz, was born in 1984 in Córdoba, a little city in the south of Spain.

He began his carrer in animation world, studing animation during two years, then was working in three films of spanish productions,three years later he moved to Mexico and worked in his fisrt comics for indy companies, then when he returned to Spain, studied Illustration carrer in Art School of Córdoba, while he was working in Farscape Scorpious for Boom Studios.  When he finished his studies, started to work in Crossed Badlands for Avatar press, Miguel Angel still working in indie comics since that moments, have worked in Arclight comics, Sygn media, Genuine comics etc...Currently  Miguel Angel is working for Evoluzione Publishing making the art of Le Fay, and covers for another titles. 

Vittorio Astone - Colorist

Hi, I'm Vittorio Astone and I'm a professional comic book artist and freelancer concept artist. I've published some short stories with Heavy Metal Magazine and Editoriale Aurea's Lanciostory and now I'm working with Vault Comics on an upcoming comic book series. As a concept artist, I'm currently working as a freelancer for private clients.

Justin Birch - Letterer

I was born in the hills of West Virginia and raised on a diet of pepperoni rolls and Ecto Cooler Hi-C. I surprised everyone, including myself, by surviving to adulthood on that diet. Now, I letter comics. My eventual dream is the same as everyone else – to work full time from home in my underwear.

I have a Bachelor's in graphic design and have been lettering comics for over a year. In that short time I've worked with numerous publishers and I know I can meet any deadline you may have. I offer a quick turnaround and competitive rates. Email for a quote.

I would love to letter your next comic.
